mapper.update: update student_course_evaluation set grade = #{grade} where student_id=#{studentId} and teacher_id=#{teacherId} and evaluation_id=#{evaluationMetaId} and course_id=#{courseId};
mapper.select: select sce.teacher_id as teacherId, su.nick_name as teacherName, sd.dept_name as deptName, sum(sce.grade) as grade from student_course_evaluation sce inner join teacher t on sce.teacher_id = t.teacher_id inner join sys_user su on t.teacher_id = su.user_name inner join sys_dept sd on su.dept_id = sd.dept_id group by sce.teacher_id order by grade;
